title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 4823 - Electronic Bingo Aids
content:

§ 4823.1 - License required

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 4823

Statutory authority: Executive Law, § 435[1][a]; Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
